p: Echinops kebericho M. was collected from Andracha woreda, Sheka zone, Southwest, Ethiopia. The identification of the plant material was previous described [ 29]. The collected fresh tuber was first washed by tap water and then by distilled water to remove dirt and debris. Pounded material of the plant was added to 5 L of distilled water in 1/5 (w/v) ratio in a round bottom glass flask and subjected to hydro-distillation for 3 h using Clevenger type apparatus at Pharmacognosy Department, School of Pharmacy, Addis Ababa University. After extraction, the EO was collected; its volume and weight were measured. The EO was dissolved in 4% Tween 80 solutions for administration. The volume of solution administered was 1 ml/100 g and the concentration was adjusted to volume needed for administration.
